attributes.action: Prohibit any examinations from taking place during the outbreak of Covid-19 (UK)
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure that the government prohibits all schools from accepting examinations to go ahead in 2021, as it will consist worrying about the spread of the virus and outbreaks. We are in a nationwide lockout at current and should work on getting through this. 

Ensure that the government and exam boards are  fair on all student welfare, mental health state  throughout GCSE, international GCSE and A levels including private candidates and state candidates.
attributes.background:
Prohibit any examinations from taking place during the outbreak of Covid-19 within the UK 2021.

Discuss with exam boards to ensure that they are aware of the learners' pandemic impact.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
